description:
Training Report
Training Goals:
Basic Protocol training
Improve obedience, attentiveness and composure
improve response to single tail
Improve claustrophobia
Improve aquaphobia
Recommendations:
I heard a tip that she fucked up on her homework assignment, so let's teach her how to properly apologize and punish right right away. Bring in a second dominant to help with her training. Let's find out how well she can satisfy two cocks, two whips, two sadistic bastards. Treat like like property and send her to her quarters covered in come. Do a surprise inspection of her hotel room in the middle of the night, and give her a scene that reinforces her status and keeps her on her toes throughout training.
title: The Training of Julie Night, Day Two
